Download Game!

[Introduction]
Defeat all opponents and survive as long as you can!

[Controls]
Move the mouse over the action nodes around the character to activate attacks and combos.

[About]
Developer: SkyrocketInteractive
Links: http://www.skyrocketinteractive.com/
